title: What ever happened to good matchmaking?
body:
I just had a ranked game (I'm bronze :P) with my bronze friend up against a gOLD LEE AND A SILVER DRAVEN WITH OVER 1,000 WINS 


Ahem... To make things simple, Riot, fix the god damn matchmaking, please.

Sincerely, from all the bronze players. SMWD

replies.body: They must have trash mmr and yours must be above average

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=8plAi6w2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-30T11:48:12.475+0000)
>
> They must have trash mmr and yours must be above average

More likely that they were duo with bronze 5 players.
Just checked. I think the Draven and Lee are smurfing, they are at silvers now.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=8plAi6w2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-30T15:32:01.665+0000)
>
> More likely that they were duo with bronze 5 players.

Golds can't duo with bronze
